item.title: Visual Code and Scala
item.description: This week I am setting up my new laptop - moving off Mac finally and back onto Linux - YAY. So one of the things I’m getting working is Visual Code Studio and Scala. Sounds easy doesn’t it? Step 2 Of course you went for Step 1 which was “aaah, this is easy, just download the extension and you’re done. How hard is that Hamish?”, so we’re starting at Step 2: for when step 1 was a fail.
